```{r cache = TRUE}
library(tidyverse)
bike_traffic <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2019/2019-04-02/bike_traffic.csv")
```

```{r}
head(bike_traffic)
str(bike_traffic)

nrow(bike_traffic %>% filter(is.na(bike_count) == TRUE))
nrow(bike_traffic %>% filter(bike_count == 0))

bike_na <- bike_traffic %>% 
    filter(is.na(bike_count) == TRUE) %>%
    group_by(crossing) %>%
    count() %>%
    rename(bike_na = n)

df_na <- bike_traffic %>% 
    filter(is.na(ped_count) == TRUE) %>%
    group_by(crossing) %>%
    count() %>%
    rename(ped_na = n) %>% 
    full_join(bike_na, by = 'crossing')

df_na <- bike_traffic %>% 
    group_by(crossing) %>%
    count() %>%
    full_join(df_na, by = 'crossing')

df_na <- df_na %>% mutate(ped_na.perc = ped_na / n,
                          bike_na.perc = bike_na / n)

```
